Student AccommodationSafe, secure and simple living.

Find your perfect home away from home

We understand that student accommodation is more than just a place to say- it’s about providing a comfortable, welcoming, and safe environment. At ISH, we’re dedicated to providing our students with spaces which successfully help them learn, live, and grow. From our unique township location to managed accommodation, students have everything they need within easy reach.

Fully managed by one of India’s leading developers for total peace of mind

Finding a place to stay during your studies shouldn’t be a hassle. We’ve teamed up with the Vatika Group- one of India’s leading real estate developers, to ensure high quality and affordable accommodation for our students.

Our collaboration with Vatika provides accommodation facilities for students within the township itself. The accommodation is just a short walk away from our campus.

Most importantly, our mission is to provide you with total security and peace of mind. All of our facilitated accommodation options have 24 hour concierge services. The township host their own dedicated police stations to ensure safety and security within the development.

Safe, secure and simple - accommodation that puts your needs first

Student housing is available a short distance away from campus, saving students from the hassles and stresses of commuting, and helping them live, work, and play comfortably in an easeful and exciting environment.

Something for everyone - and every budget

We understand that we all like to live a little differently, which is why we aim to provide something for everyone within our student accommodation. From studio apartments, to twin shared rooms and houses- our accommodation options cater to a variety of preferences.

All inclusive to township and residency facilities

During your stay in ISH facilitated accommodation, you’ll have access to the townships numerous amenities. This includes gym facilities, swimming pools, club house admission and any other benefits that come with the type of accommodation you will be choosing to stay in.

Everything you need at your fingertips

You’ll find access to shopping, restaurants and leisure facilities easier than ever within the vatika India Next township. With local grocery stores, markets and food outlets, grabbing a bite or stocking up on groceries can now be simpler than ever.

Your safety and security is our priority

Your safety is our topmost priority. At each accommodation facility a designated concierge counter monitors visitor activity and enforces only authorised entry, with site management staff available at all hours.

A 24/7 contact is also available, and provides access to maintenance contractors, emergency responders and a security team.

Ask us a question or secure your accommodation

For more information regarding student accommodation or our location, get in touch with us at admissions@ish-edu.com or drop us a line at our Contact Us page.
